byline.contributor: Jada F. Smith contributed reporting, and Kitty Bennett contributed research.

abstract: Pres Obama and his family will move to mansion in Kalorama neighborhood of Washington, DC, after he completes his term; home has monthly rent of $22,000.
snippet: The president and his family plan to relocate to the upscale Kalorama neighborhood, two miles from the White House, people familiar with his plans said....
lead_paragraph: The president and his family plan to relocate to the upscale Kalorama neighborhood, two miles from the White House, people familiar with his plans said.

headline.main: Obamas’ Next Home: 9 Bedrooms in a Wealthy Washington Neighborhood
headline.print_headline: Next Home for Obamas: 9 Bedrooms and a Past
